message: The PAI system files (hooks, skills, components) live under `~/.claude/skills/PAI/` — that's where the depth classification logic is defined. Since your question was about how the Algorithm handles simple questions, those are the right files to investigate, not the `az-demo` codebase. Want me to continue with the plan for fixing the depth classification?

message: Your mission is being the bridge at AstraZeneca — the person who sees across R&D science and data science to champion AI projects that solve real workflow problems. Your Q2 2026 push is compressing idea-to-pilot from 6 months to 8 weeks, and your strategies center on surfacing constraints early, using structured questions over meetings, and killing bad ideas fast so good ones move faster.
